content: (Adds details  background)     Oct 13 The Irish Takeover Panel said on Tuesday that it had rejected generic drugmaker Perrigo Company Plc's  request to declare Mylan NV's unsolicited tender offer lapsed.     The offer from Mylan remains "lawful and valid and fully capable of acceptance" by all Perrigo shareholders including Israeli ones  the takeover panel said.      Netherlands-based Mylan has offered $75 in cash and 2.3 Mylan shares for each Perrigo share  a combination now wort
